formState.description: Form state object, including field values and errors.

onFieldChange.description: Callback fired when a form field is changed.

onReset.description: Callback fired when the form is reset.

onSubmit.description: Callback fired when the form is submitted.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside.

slotDescriptions.checkbox: The checkbox component used in the form.
slotDescriptions.datePicker: The date picker component used in the form.
slotDescriptions.dateTimePicker: The date and time picker component used in the form.
slotDescriptions.select: The select component used in the form.
slotDescriptions.textField: The text field component used in the form.
